_comment: IMPORTANT: Before using this trading bot, please follow these steps:

2. Create your API credentials here: https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/API
3. Make sure you fund your account with usdc before starting the trading bot
4. Add your secret_key and your new generated account_address below
